en.proj1Desc: ML model predicting potential delay claims based on daily site reports.
en.proj2Desc: Script automating BOQ pricing analysis, comparing vendor bids.
en.proj3Desc: Prototype AI model detecting PPE compliance on construction sites.
en.exp1Desc:
• Managing full IPC (Interim Payment Certificate) process.
  • Developing automated claim management tools using Python.
en.exp2Desc:
• Prepared tenders for infrastructure projects in 10+ countries.
  • Managed FIDIC Yellow Book 1999 contract procedures.
en.exp3Desc: • Created Master Schedule using TILOS; reduced planning conflicts.
en.exp4Desc: • Established technical office standards and led earthworks planning.
en.edu2Desc: • 5-Course Spec: Data Structures, Web Data, SQL Databases.
en.edu3Desc: • 66-Hour comprehensive training on PMI standards and project management processes.
en.edu_itu_claimDesc: • Specialized program on FIDIC contracts, claims management, and dispute resolution.
en.edu4Desc: • Advanced linear scheduling techniques for infrastructure projects (Highways, Pipelines).
en.edu5Desc: • Advanced resource management, risk analysis, and progress tracking in Primavera P6.
en.edu6Desc: • International arbitration procedures and dispute resolution frameworks.
en.edu7Desc: • Thesis focus: Artificial Intelligence applications in Geotechnical Engineering.
en.edu8Desc: • Graduated as Honor Student with a focus on Structural and Geotechnical courses.
